job_history.work_description: Answer applicants' questions about benefits and claim procedures. Interview benefits recipients at specified intervals to certify their eligibility for continuing benefits. Interpret and explain information such as eligibility requirements, application details, payment methods, and applicants' legal rights. Initiate procedures to grant, modify, deny, or terminate assistance, or refer applicants to other agencies for assistance. Compile, record, and evaluate personal and financial data in order to verify completeness and accuracy, and to determine eligibility status. Interview and investigate applicants for public assistance to gather information pertinent to their applications. Check with employers or other references to verify answers and obtain further information. Keep records of assigned cases, and prepare required reports. Schedule benefits claimants for adjudication interviews to address questions of eligibility. Prepare applications and forms for applicants for such purposes as school enrollment, employment, and medical services.

Supervise employees engaged in tax preparation services. Compute taxes owed or overpaid, using adding machines or personal computers, and complete entries on forms, following tax form instructions and tax tables. Prepare or assist in preparing simple to complex tax returns for individuals or small businesses. Use all appropriate adjustments, deductions, and credits to keep clients' taxes to a minimum. Interview clients to obtain additional information on taxable income and deductible expenses and allowances. Review financial records such as income statements and documentation of expenditures to determine forms needed to prepare tax returns. Furnish taxpayers with sufficient information and advice to ensure correct tax form completion. Consult tax law handbooks or bulletins to determine procedures for preparation of atypical returns. Calculate form preparation fees according to return complexity and processing time required. Check data input or verify totals on forms prepared by others to detect errors in arithmetic, data entry, or procedures.

skills.name: Tax Preparation
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in preparing simple to complex tax returns for individuals and small businesses, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Strong proficiency in reviewing financial records, computing taxes owed, and determining forms needed to prepare tax returns.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Supervised employees engaged in tax preparation services, showing a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided information and advice to taxpayers, and interviewed clients to obtain additional information, indicating a solid working proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Data Entry
skills.explanation: Entered data into forms, following tax form instructions and tax tables, showing a solid working proficiency in data entry.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Calculated form preparation fees according to return complexity and processing time required, indicating a solid working proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Attention to Detail
skills.explanation: Verified totals on forms prepared by others to detect errors in arithmetic, data entry, or procedures, showing strong proficiency in attention to detail.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Furnished taxpayers with sufficient information and advice to ensure correct tax form completion, indicating a solid working proficiency in communication.
